title: Praat
description: annotation and sound feature analysis; has been ported directly into Python (see Parselmouth)
taxonomicOrSoundTypeSpecializationIfAny: individual sound analysis; originally intended for human phonetics
annotation: annotate sounds from individual animals, e.g. for studies of vocal repertoire and learning
acousticParameterMeasurement: wide variety of speech analysis tools, e.g. fundamental frequency analysis; spectral, pitch, formant, intensity analysis
